findings.title: Owner can change the tax, burn, charity and liquidity fee
findings.description: The owner has privileges to modify fees without restrictions.

findings.title: Owner can change the maximum transaction amount
findings.description: The contract owner has the privilege to modify the maximum transaction amount, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can exclude from the fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to exclude certain addresses or transactions from paying fees.

findings.title: Owner can change number of tokens to sell to add to liquidity
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the number of tokens sold to add liquidity, which may lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can transfer contract tokens to any address
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the privilege to transfer contract tokens to any address without restrictions.

findings.title: Owner can transfer any BNB amount to any address
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to transfer any BNB amount to any address without restrictions.

findings.title: Owner can lock and unlock
findings.description: The owner has the ability to lock and unlock, which could allow them to retake privileges even after ownership was renounced.
